sourcesContent:
About me
Hi, I am a Front-end deverloper based in Karlsruhe, Germany. I started as sensor systems technology engineer (M.Sc.) and found my path to software development playing around with Arduino and Raspberry Pi boards in combination with high-end gesture sensor systems.
I like to to experiment with eye catching user interfaces and focus on user-friendly interaction.
I love to structure every bit and byte of information. That is what I love about programming. Everytime it is just breath-taking that you can develop some stuff just like out of the blue. You just have to combine the best of all worlds to create something innovative.
